Caught off guard, Cody stumbles his words and is caught eyeing her large breasts.After realizing the boss was going to be on a conference call for 30 minutes before he'd get a chance to speak with Cody, our favorite hunk decides to take matters, and the secretary's tits, into his own hands.Of course there's more than boob fondling. Mia, the secretary, takes his cock into her mouth, licks his ass, and lets him fuck the silly out of her. All this and a massive cumshot to complete another action packed Cody Cummings scene. Enjoy!
title: The new secretary's initiation to Cody.
